title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Intense Nighttime Assault on Hezbollah’s Terror Infrastructure in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF has attacked the terror infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization from which firing was carried out towards Israel.

During the night and in the early hours, an air force combat aircraft and an IDF aircraft attacked the terror infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization, from which firing was carried out towards Israeli territory last night. Also, forces attacked with artillery in Lebanese territory.

In continuation of the alerts in the north of the country last night, a number of launches were identified from Lebanese territory towards Israeli territory.
The IDF attacked the source of the firing with artillery.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/41uGTCE
